name: State of...
description:
STATE OF...

THIS IS A SIMPLE GAME I HAVE INVENTED AND CREATED FOR APPLE II COMPUTERS AND EMULATORS. YOU HAVE TO GUESS YOUR
STATE OF MIND BETWEEN 3 STATE: HAPPY, HUNGRY, JOYFUL BY SELECTING 1 OR 2 OR 3.

CODE

1 RESTORE : PRINT "FIND YOUR STATE OF MIND":PRINT "INSERT NUMBER:": PRINT  "1(HAPPY, 2(HUNGRY, 3 (JOYFUL": PRINT ""
5 INPUT J
10 FOR I = 1 TO J: READ J$
20 DATA  HAPPY, HUNGRY, JOYFUL :NEXT I: PRINT J$ 
30 H = INT (3 * RND(1))+1 : PRINT ""
40 IF J = H THEN PRINT "YES, YOU ARE",J$ : PRINT ""
45 IF J < > H THEN PRINT "NO YOU ARE NOT",J$ : PRINT ""
60 GOTO 1

HOW THE CODE WORKS

IT COMPARE A SET OF DATA BETWEEN A RANDOM AND GIVE AN ANSWER BASED ON THE COMPARISION OF THE TWO STATE.

ENJOY MY EASY 8 line GAME

MATTEO TREVISAN "TOOLKITMAN"
